segments.text: I have a sore throat and headache .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , my whole body feels weak . And I really feel terrible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that . I'll have to examine you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Open your mouth and show me your tongue . Say ah ... You have a bad cold . So you must stay in bed for a week .
segments.speaker: S1
